title: India to be global manufacturing hub for IPO-bound Hyundai, executive says
description: Hyundai Motor Co projects rapid market growth in India and aims to establish it as a global manufacturing hub. The upcoming Indian IPO, set to be the country's largest, involves the South Korean parent selling a 17.5% stake for approximately $3 billion, valuing the Indian unit at $19 billion.
